attributes.action: bring all the dishonest politions to justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in a time when the british people are going through a real and hard depresion, why do the elected politions feel that they are free to try and con the electorite out of their hard earned tax money. to say that they have made accounting errors or gross mistakes and they just followed the rules and guidelines, is a cop out. it is just plain theft and the guilty should be brought to the courts and dealt with like any other citizen in this great country, and not let off with just a slap on their wrists.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
